title: Phase 3: Update Error module with renamed variants
description: Update src/error/mod.rs to rename variants for new module names and remove obsolete variants. OpenAI becomes OpenRouter, Langfuse becomes Telemetry.
acceptance_criteria: OpenAI variant renamed to OpenRouter(#[from] async_openai::error::OpenAIError)
OpenAIRateLimited renamed to RateLimited { retry_after: Option<Duration> }
OpenAIMissingParameter renamed to MissingParameter { param: String }
